text: Kamfu tonmale yakakale balañjun, Got valambale balañjun, betɨle yetɨk balañjɨkɨn ŋunundi ŋakɨk wulu mɨmɨliwɨ ŋaŋalambalen, Balañjɨkɨk Fakɨn, wokok wun yiŋɨmale vandi, wun mɨñakavik mɨmɨliwɨ ŋaŋalambapa katɨk balañjɨk. Balañjɨkɨk Fakɨn katɨk vandi wokok Waŋkɨk gasak pɨtɨkti valɨŋgo apɨkowɨ yiŋɨmama Gotkɨk anafawali luasamban sulundi.”
